participant_1.name: Simon
participant_1.personality: Sensitive and introspective, struggles with the holiday season but finds joy in nature.
participant_1.background: the holidays make me depressed. i've rainbow hair. my age is too old to say. i'm an animal activist. i spend my time bird watching with my cats.

participant_2.name: Jessica
participant_2.personality: Energetic and competitive, passionate about fitness and sports, with a bright and optimistic outlook.
participant_2.background: my favorite color is yellow. i workout four hours a day. gymnastics is my favorite sport. i'm a gold medalist olympian.

content.text: hi, how are you? I just got back from the holidays. I love it
I am a activist. I spend time watching the holidays with my rainbow hair
oh, I am sorry to hear that. what do you do for a living?
